Ludum Dare 41 Entry
Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

Instructions:

The objective is to match 4 of the same color horizontal or vertical to remove all the targets.

Arrow Keys to move the snake.
If you hit something or yourself the snake falls down in it's current shape and you get a new snake.

If a snake is completely inside level at the top when it can't move anymore the game is over.

Thanks for playing.
